meanings.definition: A carved or cast figure of a person or animal, especially one that is life-size or larger, made from a material such as stone, metal, or wood.
meanings.sent1: The statue of the soldier stood tall in the park.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the beautiful marble statue in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The statue of the cat seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a statue of strength in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The statue's intricate details made it a masterpiece of art.

meanings.definition: A representation of a person or animal in a three-dimensional form, typically made of a durable material.
meanings.sent1: The bronze statue of the lion was a symbol of courage.
meanings.sent2: She received a miniature statue of a horse as a gift.
meanings.sent3: The statue of the dog appeared to be chasing its own tail.
meanings.sent4: His words were a statue of wisdom in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The crystal statue sparkled in the sunlight.
